sentences.en: Adam invented love at first sight, one of the greatest laborsaving machine the world ever saw.
sentences.cn: 亚当发明了一见钟情, 那是世界空前的一架最伟大的省力机器.

sentences.en: The way to make self-sufficiency work on a small scale is to resist the temptation to buy a tractor and other expensive laborsaving devices.
sentences.cn: 小范围里实现自给自足的途径是抵制诱惑，不去购置拖拉机和其他昂贵的节省劳力的机械。

sentences.en: There is new emphasis on research and development of laborsaving machines.
sentences.cn: 工业界开始着重研究工作,并且大量采用机器以节省人工.
